price: 11. Umaane inki num maxagta Yallih meklaay kay idini akke waytek, kaadu woh Yallak is xagtem nummayse num, Yalli kay sorkocobbaxa tirri haa wohul yisbireemih taagah, Yalli ummaanim yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِ قَلۡبَهُۥۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā aṣāba min muṣībatin illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi waman yu'min bil-lahi yahdi qalbahu wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
